p: Individual model performances varied across model algorithms and subspecies in interpolation validations ( Fig 3). The machine learning methods (i.e. fMaxent, GBM, RF) generally showed better discriminant ability than regression models (i.e. GAM, GLM); GARP showed unstable performance ( Fig 3). Similar to the machine learning models, consensus models showed good discriminant ability for the individual subspecies and for O. hupensis as a whole ( Fig 3).
